content:
Some of the gourmet food and tea subscription services I mentioned offer personalized selections, while others provide a standard box each month. Here's a breakdown:

**Personalized Options:**

1. **Mantry**: Mantry offers a personalized food subscription box. When you sign up, you'll take a survey to indicate your dietary preferences, flavor profiles, and food interests. Their team of food experts will then curate a selection of artisanal foods tailored to your tastes.
2. **The Tea Spot**: The Tea Spot offers a personalized tea subscription service. You'll take a tea profile quiz to indicate your tea preferences, and their tea sommeliers will select a selection of loose-leaf teas based on your tastes.
3. **Bean Box**: Bean Box offers a personalized coffee and tea subscription service. You'll take a survey to indicate your coffee and tea preferences, and their team will curate a selection of gourmet, small-batch coffee and tea from around the world.

**Standard Box Options:**

1. **The Mouth**: The Mouth offers a standard gourmet food subscription box each month, featuring a selection of artisanal cheeses, charcuterie, and accompaniments. While they don't offer personalized selections, they do offer different subscription options (e.g., cheese-only, meat-and-cheese, etc.) to cater to different tastes.
2. **Love with Food**: Love with Food offers a standard gourmet food subscription box each month, featuring a selection of gourmet food samples from around the world. They don't offer personalized selections, but they do offer different subscription options (e.g., gluten-free, vegan, etc.) to cater to different dietary needs.
3. **TeaRunners**: TeaRunners offers a standard tea subscription box each month, featuring a selection of loose-leaf teas from around the world. While they don't offer personalized selections, they do offer different subscription options (e.g., black tea, green tea, etc.) to cater to different tea preferences.
4. **Gourmet Food World**: Gourmet Food World offers a standard gourmet food subscription box each month, featuring a selection of gourmet foods, including artisanal cheeses, crackers, jams, and chocolates. They don't offer personalized selections, but they do offer different subscription options (e.g., cheese-only, sweet treats, etc.) to cater to different tastes.

**Hybrid Models:**

1. **Cratejoy**: Cratejoy is a subscription box marketplace that offers a range of gourmet food and tea boxes from various vendors. While they don't offer personalized selections, you can browse through their marketplace and choose a box that aligns with your friend's interests and preferences.

Keep in mind that some services may offer one-time gift options or the ability to pause or skip months, so be sure to review the terms and conditions before signing up.

I hope this helps you make an informed decision!
